paragraphs.content: The First Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Thessalonians
paragraphs.contentHtml: <small>The First Epistle of</small> <small>Paul the Apostle to the</small> Thessalonians

paragraphs.content: Paul, and Silvanus, and Timotheus, unto the church of the Thessalonians which is in God the Father and in the Lord Jesus Christ: Grace be unto you, and peace, from God our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Paul, and Silvanus, and Timotheus, unto the church of the Thessalonians which is in God the Father and in the Lord Jesus Christ: Grace be unto you, and peace, from God our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ.

paragraphs.content: We give thanks to God always for you all, making mention of you in our prayers;
paragraphs.contentHtml: We give thanks to God always for you all, making mention of you in our prayers;

paragraphs.content: Remembering without ceasing your work of faith, and labour of love, and patience of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ, in the sight of God and our Father;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Remembering without ceasing your work of faith, and labour of love, and patience of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ, in the sight of God and our Father;

paragraphs.content: Knowing, brethren beloved, your election of God.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Knowing, brethren beloved, your election of God.

paragraphs.content: For our gospel came not unto you in word only, but also in power, and in the Holy Ghost, and in much assurance; as ye know what manner of men we were among you for your sake.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For our gospel came not unto you in word only, but also in power, and in the Holy Ghost, and in much assurance; as ye know what manner of men we were among you for your sake.

paragraphs.content: And ye became followers of us, and of the Lord, having received the word in much affliction, with joy of the Holy Ghost:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And ye became followers of us, and of the Lord, having received the word in much affliction, with joy of the Holy Ghost:

paragraphs.content: So that ye were ensamples to all that believe in Macedonia and Achaia.
paragraphs.contentHtml: So that ye were ensamples to all that believe in Macedonia and Achaia.

paragraphs.content: For from you sounded out the word of the Lord not only in Macedonia and Achaia, but also in every place your faith to God-ward is spread abroad; so that we need not to speak any thing.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For from you sounded out the word of the Lord not only in Macedonia and Achaia, but also in every place your faith to God-ward is spread abroad; so that we need not to speak any thing.

paragraphs.content: For they themselves shew of us what manner of entering in we had unto you, and how ye turned to God from idols to serve the living and true God;
paragraphs.contentHtml: For they themselves shew of us what manner of entering in we had unto you, and how ye turned to God from idols to serve the living and true God;

paragraphs.content: And to wait for his Son from heaven, whom he raised from the dead, even Jesus, which delivered us from the wrath to come.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And to wait for his Son from heaven, whom he raised from the dead, even Jesus, which delivered us from the wrath to come.
